div.p: The Warren County Schools Transportation Department recognized their Administrative Assistants this week.This week was designated as Administrative Assistant's Week. Thank you to all of the school district's administrative assistants and the support they provide

Ms. Aguilar at Northside K-8 conducted a Google Slides training yesterday. 42 staff members at Northside K-8 and Warren County Middle School participated. Teachers and staff are working hard to adjust to a new way of teaching our students.
The staff at WNTHS participated in a virtual PD with their New Tech Network coach today to discuss how we can prepare our agendas to engage our students in virtual learning.
"Meating the Need" Community Chicken Sale. May 1st beginning at 9:00 am at Warren County Middle School. check out the flyer for information.

PreK students in Mrs. Sidberry’s class celebrates Earth Day. We read Lola Plants a Garden and talked about keeping our Earth clean.
